comments.text:
After migration from SM 1, the link toolbar is hidden (as per default), because its setting is not migrated (see bug 621964) - but it should.
Alas, the behaviour settings of the link toolbar are stored in localstore.rdf, but it does not belong there; localstore.rdf should only store sizes, visibility, etc., and not "behaviour".

Link toolbar behaviour should be a real pref.
